title: Dashboard — Rename and fix Shoots this week section
description: Rename 'Next seven days' to 'Shoots this week'. Debug missing scheduled shoot display and validate date filtering logic.
acceptanceCriteria: Date filtering returns shoots within current week
Scheduled shoots from Monday board data appear

steps.details: Find 'Next seven days' string in dashboard page/components and replace with 'Shoots this week'.
Check the query fetching upcoming shoots. Verify date range filter (should be from today to end of current week or +7 days). Check if shoots table has data matching the filter criteria.
Ensure the date comparison uses correct timezone handling. Filter shoots where shoot_date >= today AND shoot_date <= today + 7 days. Test with known scheduled shoots.

technicalNotes: Date filtering must account for timezone — use UTC or server timezone consistently
Cross-reference with shoots table data to confirm filter accuracy
